seo.title: My Dashboard – Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing
seo.description: Manage your personal information and security settings on your account dashboard.
seo.errorDescription: An error occurred while retrieving your profile. Please try again later.

dashboard.title: Account Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your personal information and security settings
dashboard.name: Name and Surname
dashboard.successMessageProfileUpdate: Your name and surname have been updated successfully.
dashboard.successMessageEmailUpdate: Your email has been updated successfully. Please check your inbox to confirm.
dashboard.successMessagePasswordUpdate: Your password has been updated successfully.
dashboard.scanQRCodeWithoutConfirm: Scan the QR code below with your authentication app to enable two-factor authentication.
dashboard.secret: Secret to enter manually into the 2FA app (keep it safe)
dashboard.enterOtpAfterScan: After scanning the QR code, click Next to enter the code generated by your authentication app.
dashboard.enterCodeToConfirm: Enter the code generated by your authentication app to confirm enabling two-factor authentication.
dashboard.recoveryCodesNote: Keep these codes safe. They will allow you to access your account if you lose access to your authentication app.
dashboard.enterCodeToDisable: Enter the code generated by your authentication app to confirm disabling two-factor authentication.
dashboard.enterRecoveryCodeToDisable: Enter a recovery code to disable two-factor authentication.

errors.fetchProfile: Unable to fetch your profile. Please try again later.
errors.nameRequired: First name and last name are required.
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.nameUpdate: Error updating name and surname. Please try again.
errors.emailUpdate: Error updating email. Please try again.
errors.passwordUpdate: Error updating password. Please try again.
